sns_toolbox.renderer

Take in a network, and render its structure using the package ‘graphviz’.

Module Contents

Functions

render(net: sns_toolbox.networks.Network, view=True, save=False, filename=None, img_format='png')

Attributes

graphviz_available

graphviz_available

shell

sns_toolbox.renderer.graphviz_available = True
sns_toolbox.renderer.graphviz_available = False
